sentences: Edward Maurice Lisbona (16 July 1905 â€“ 30 November 1989) was an English songwriter, who under the name of Eddie "Piano" Miller, was also a popular piano player and bandleader of the 1950s and 1960s.
Lisbona was born in Manchester, England.
He died in Pinellas Park, Florida, United States.
"It's My Mother's Birthday Today", a hit for Arthur Tracy
"Gently", recorded by Elvis Presley in 1961 (Something for Everybody)
